name: Calming Collecting
description:
Controlls:

  • E: Collect mushroom
  • WASD: Walk

Feeling stressed out?   "Calming Collecting" is a relaxing game, where you:

  1.  Decide for a branch.
  2.  Collect mushrooms.
  3. Trade them for "guardian-statue-points".

The game was developed within a total of 3 hours for the 182nd Trijam and based around the Theme "Branching out".

In order to finish on time "Calming Collecting" includes free assets from some very talented creators.

  • Lo-Fi Music: Created/distributed by VOiD1Gaming (www.void1gaming.com)
  • Mushroom Assets: Created/distributed by ssugmi (ssugmi - itch.io)
  • 16x16 Character: Created/distributed by javikolog (@javikolog - itch.io)
  • UI Sprites: Created/distributed by PaperHatLizard (PaperHatLizard - itch.io)
  • Floor and Environment Sprites: Created/distributed by Cainos (Cainos - itch.io)

Thanks for playing "Calming Collecting", I would love to hear your feedback. ^^
